High-Dimensional Case-Cohort Analysis tools in R.

## Features

- Simulate attained-age survival data for Cox PH models with constant or
  piecewise baseline hazards (`sim_cox_age_data`).
- Scale baseline hazards to target incidence rates.
- Utilities for case-cohort designs and weighting schemes (Prentice,
  Barlow, Binder).

## Installation

``` r
# From GitHub
remotes::install_github("IARCBiostat/HDccAnalysis")

# Or from a local checkout
remotes::install_local(".", upgrade = "never")
```

## Documentation

### Data simulations

The
[HDccAnalysis::sim_cox_age_data()](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/sim_cox_age_data.md)
function can be used to simulate survival data with different incidence
rates. You can follow these vignettes to simulate survival data:

- Vignette: [Simulating
  data](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/articles/simulating-data.md)
  â€” walkthrough of data generation with a scalar baseline hazard.
- Reference: function help pages generated from the `R/` source.

## Contributing

Issues and pull requests are welcome at the GitHub repository.

# Package index

## Simulation

- [`sim_cox_age_data()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/sim_cox_age_data.md)
  : Simulate attained-age survival data under a Cox PH model

## All functions

- [`.make_age_rate_tbl()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/dot-make_age_rate_tbl.md)
  : Validate or construct an attained-age baseline hazard table
- [`.overlap_weight()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/dot-overlap_weight.md)
  : Compute follow-up overlap with an attained-age band
- [`.rate_and_band_at_age()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/dot-rate_and_band_at_age.md)
  : Retrieve baseline hazard rate and band index at a given attained age
- [`.scale_to_avg_inc()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/dot-scale_to_avg_inc.md)
  : Scale baseline hazard to a target average incidence rate
- [`.simulate_one()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/dot-simulate_one.md)
  : Simulate a single subject's event time under piecewise-constant
  hazard
- [`generate_age_rate_tbl()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/generate_age_rate_tbl.md)
  : Reformat age-group incidence data into an age-rate lookup table
- [`sim_cox_age_data()`](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/reference/sim_cox_age_data.md)
  : Simulate attained-age survival data under a Cox PH model

  data](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/articles/simulating-data.md):
- [Survival data with a constant baseline
  hazard](https://IARCBiostat.github.io/HDccAnalysis/articles/survival-data-with-a-constant-baseline-hazard.md):
